Posts.Content: Jul 20, 2010 04:55PM Mojo59 wrote: Vote was not good by the  panel today - 12-1 by the experts to remove the approval.  Ugh -  I've been through 6 cycles of Abraxane/Avastin/Zometa and was going on Avastin for "maintenance" for god knows how long - well be interesting to see what the Dr comes up with base on this development!
Posts.Title: FDA May Drop Avastin, Does Little To Help Breast Cancer Patients dhmeiser gpawelski
